msg: A patch from Sascha Rodekamp "atalog Services HTML Safe" (https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-3785) - OFBIZ-3785
Set text parameter to 'safe'(allow HMTL), now you can add some HTML Tags in your Product/Category Simple Text (maybe highlighting tags etc.).
